name: Solve Puzzles and Escape Out The Front Door
name_original: Solve Puzzles and Escape Out The Front Door
description:
Controls:

WASD : Move

~ : Pause

Left Click: Interact

Right Click: Exit/Close Menu

This was made for the PB& Game Jam and took a week to complete. It was really fun making this type of game and we hope you enjoy. Comments are welcome, we would love to hear your experience and if you managed to escape!

This is the first puzzle game that we've made so feedback on difficulty is appreciated.
